product_name: Picky Bars Real Food Energy Bar
long_description: Made of only real food, the dairy- and gluten-free Picky Bars Real Food energy bar tastes amazing and is balanced with the right ingredients to give you the energy you need to get through workouts. All Picky Bars have a 4:1 carbohydrate-to-protein ratio that has been shown to effectively help muscles rebuild and recover after physical activity. Balanced macronutrient ratios provide lasting energy to help you get through daily activities, long hikes and fast bike rides. The Runner's High, All-In Almond, and Need for Seed flavors are 85% organic; Smooth Caffeinator flavor is 62% organic. Smooth Caffeinator includes 25mg of caffeine, which is equivalent to about 1/3 of a cup of coffee. All-In Almond and Smooth Caffeinator flavors are sweetened with agave rather than honey, and are therefore vegan. All Picky Bars Real Food energy bars are gluten- and dairy-free, and made in a gluten-free faciliity; no artificial sweeteners. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Made of only real food, the dairy- and gluten-free Picky Bars Real Food energy bar tastes amazing and is balanced with the right ingredients to give you the energy you need to get through workouts.
